oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Next for Misskelley: one- man cell, testing
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: West Memphis Three; West Memphis, Arkansas; murders; Misskelley, Jessie Lloyd, Jr.; 1990s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: One of the many articles in the Commercial Appeal on the day after Jessie Misskelley was found guilty in the murder of three West Memphis boys.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Duffy, Joan I.
oai_dc:dc.dc:format: photocopy of newspaper clipping, mounted, 9.75 x 7.25 in.
